overview.en: Golem (GLM) is a cryptocurrency and operates on the Ethereum platform. Golem has a current supply of 1,000,000,000. The last known price of Golem is 0.49152529 USD and is down -6.39 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 61 active market(s) with $34,202,313.98 traded over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at https://golem.network/.
